txt.en: 'Calenglad wants you to return to him at once so he may tell you of his meeting with the Blue Lady. Do not delay, [placeholder]!\n\n'You have been a great help to me and have done much good for the people of Ost Forod. I hope to see you again, but for now you should return to Tinnudir and speak with Calenglad!'

'I am glad to see you again, [placeholder], and to know that you have not been idle while I journeyed. Robin spoke of the aid you rendered, and I believe that the people of Ost Forod are better for your service.\n\n'I have spoken with Gwindeth about acquiring the Silithar for Aragorn, but she is not satisfied with what I have told her of you. She wants to meet you herself.'
'What are you waiting for, [placeholder]? Calenglad waits for you at Tinnudir, to the south-west!'
'The Blue Lady of Nenuial is as changeable as the surface of the lake itself.'
Calenglad sent word to Robin Dunkley that he has returned from his journey to meet with Gwindeth and wants to speak with you.
'Gwindeth has lived by Lake Nenuial for years uncounted.'
Calenglad is at the Ranger-camp on the island of Tinnudir, south-west of Ost Forod, in Evendim.\n\nThe Ranger Calenglad has sent word that he wishes to speak with you.
